de.lessvoid.niftyinternal.canvas

Class LineParameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lessvoid.niftyinternal.canvas.LineParameters

  • public class LineParameters
extends Object
    This collects all available parameters for rendering lines. This is part of the NiftyRenderDevice interface because it is only part of the SPI and not really a part of the public Nifty API in the sense that this class is only used to communicate settings between Nifty and the NiftyRenderDevice. This class is not meant to be used by actual user code.
